titles.title: A bill to authorize a certificate of documentation for the vessel SERENITY.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S7066-7067)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings without amendment. With written report No. 103-343.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 585.

bill.summary: 6/16/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel.
